item.title: Octopus Film Festival 2020
item.description: Again Octopus Film Festival took place Gda≈Ñsk‚ùóÔ∏è That was third edition. First two editions take five days and has one “hidden show”. This time there was little different (it’s ofc caused by COVID-19). There wasn’t hidden show, max number of people on each movie was reduced - that’s why I missed some projections üò≠ But there was good news too!!! Organizers prepare to us something new - Audience Award for the best move in category “Genre Cinema” (idk how to translate it properly).

item.title: Pol'and'Rock Festival 2020
item.description: 2020 is really weird. SARS-CoV-2 ü¶† caused, we had to sitting at our homes, with only virtual entertainment. After few months, goverments allows for some events, but with strictly rules üò∑. Thats why, Woodstock festival in Poland (nowadays known as Pol’and’Rock) took place in internet this year. Only small group of lucky guys, won a tickets (Woodstock was never ticketed), rest of us, had to watch festival in the Internet. For these three days my home turns into “festival stage”.

item.title: Why I made this blog?
item.description: In the chilhood, I had blog only once and never thought, I’ll create any blog again. üòä About week ago at work, I had to find solution for problem with angular, which I solved half year ago. Digging these same pages led me to fix it. After that, I wrote message to my friend TehGM about it to let my flustration out. He sugested me to create blog and document how I solve problems.
